WRITING.TITLE: very realistic and odd dreams after an LSD trip
WRITING.TEXT: i normally never remember my dreams and when i do, they are usually very outlandish and wild? After a 200ug LSD trip about a week ago, I started having intensely realistic and vivid dreams every night. These dreams almost always take place in my current and exact location. Sometimes these dreams are good, but most of the time they aren't. Are these types of dreams common after tripping?

my first ever girlfriend was someone i met my freshman year of college, through my neighbors who i was friends with one day, before we started dating, i was tripping OUT and staring at my dorm room ceiling getting all existential as one does my friend and my soon to be GF walk into my dorm and start eating the food they got on my roommates side of the room, and since i hadn #8217;t known her very long did not want to reveal my current state of mind they ended up sitting in my dorm talking for 3 hours during the peak of my 3 tab trip, and i did my best but DAMN that was the most surreal experience of my life

300 is a very big dose no matter how experience you are and everyone who says otherwise is either lying or binging on acid and need 300 just to trip also if you redosed after like an hour from the first tab, it probably didn #8217;t do anything, which is what i suspect you did since 300ug with no previous trips should blast your mind to mars and back as far as feeling cold and uncomfortable, eat well for a few days before the trip, and shower and change into fresh clothes before you drop the tabs. being cold happens you just gotta deal with that, for jaw clenching gum works great
three tabs would definitely overwhelmed you in ways you could never explain as a tip, commit to your dose before you drop

WRITING.TITLE: alcohol CAN be amazing
WRITING.TEXT: see a lot of hate for alcohol on this sub which i dont get 1. DRINK NICE STUFF. some shitty $5 handle of vodka is always going to be bad. Dont drink often and save up money for a nice bottle of scotch or some local craft beers and you'll see how much better it can be 2. PACE YOURSELF. seriously just drink responsibly, nurse a drink for 30-40 minutes and have a glass of water with you 3. DRINK WITH FRIENDS. talking to close friends or watching sports while staying in control is always a great time. dont drink alone and dont drink to escape alcohol is wonderful and i guarantee drinking responsibly leaves you with all your memories intact, no hangover, and no embarrassing moments
my favorite athletes and musicians all had long hair
not good not as bad as a lot of people out there but not as happy as i used to be
just wait until the first time you listen to their album named animals
you probably wont feel the alcohol but if you drink enough you will feel the hangover and the nausea keep the two separate other than the last few hours of the comedown
never tried drinking before tripping but my advice is either skip out on the lsd or the alcohol

keep it up bro and eventually you #8217;ll get to the bootleg live performances from 1960 and that #8217;s where shit REALLY gets trippy my all time favorite band, seen them (roger waters + others) live twice if you have spotify check out their early years collection
you just got too high the frame vision thing happened to me too when i started it #8217;ll go away as you smoke more often or smoke less per session

WRITING.TITLE: my potentially controversial top 10 doors songs list
WRITING.TEXT: I think my favorite songs are very different than most peoples taste of the doors. I always thought The End was the most overrated song they made I love the doors, but personally enjoy listening to the early works of pink floyd and jimi hendrix a lot more \#10: People are Strange The first doors song I ever heard and will have a special place in my heart \#9: My Wild Love very very hypnotic song to listen to \#8: I Looked at You CAUSE ITS TOO LAAAAAAAAAAAATE and the false ending \#7: Strange Days the bassline on this song is incredible and I could listen to this on repeat for days \#6: Yes, The River Knows I really like the lyrics and the piano \#5: Love Me Two Times The organ part of this song plus its very fun to sing along to \#4: Five to One The aggressiveness of this song is really powerful to listen to \#3: Take it as it Comes I love the energy of this song, its really catchy and fun to sing a long to. The lyrics helped me get through my many month long existential crisis \#2: Spanish Caravan The flamenco guitar work here speaks for itself and the whole lifestyle of just wandering around Europe has always been a dream to me. This is one of the few songs where Krieger really shines on, a lot of doors songs arent very guitar heavy \#1: Universal Mind [Im the freedom man baby thats how lucky i am](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FYWz_9XktTA)

i don #8217;t mess with that stuff so i don #8217;t have any advice but just be safe and do your research brother

sounds like real lsd dude or an analogue that #8217;s the same as real lsd it takes a while to really kick in but you should still feel stuff after 15-30 mins depending on method of taking trip lasts 12 hours but you #8217;re not blasted out of the universe the entire time and 5 hours sounds about right. that #8217;s called the lsd comedown. you also didn #8217;t take very much so not surprising that the comedown visuals were minor weed cranks it up to another level, even when getting high on the comedown lsd can cause nausea and stomach problems especially if you don #8217;t have the best diet

WRITING.TITLE: 4-ho-met questions
WRITING.TEXT: So i just bought 10 20mg pellets of 4-ho-met, and I've never had any RC mushroom before One of my good friends wants to trip. I've read that 4-ho-met is similar to AL-LAD where it is mostly visual and doesnt give you as intense of a headspace. Is 20mg a good dose for a friend who's never tripped? I have experience with psychedelics, but mostly lsd. My only mushroom trip was 2 grams, but I've gone up to 400ug on LSD and my preferred dose is 200ug. Should I also start with 20mg? Or would it be underwhelming. Im looking for something around 200ug of lsd in intensity

take lsd first. 1 tab if you're nervous, 2 tabs if you're adventurous then, as a pink floyd fan, look up their early works collection on spotify and just listen as it all makes sense to you Ive never done salvia or dmt, but lsd is a lot more fun/recreational than mushrooms and more importantly controllable in my opinion expect to just feel different

lsd = more dreamy, much more clarity, definitely easier to function or act sober, music is amazing on acid, you see really cool patterns and other distortions. it is a full day trip though mushrooms = more stoning, more lazy, can be confusing. lighter visuals but waaaaay brighter colors and vibrancy. more earthy, more introspective. music can sounds weird and creepy, or really really slow its easier to control a lsd trip. you can go hiking or for a walk if you want, you can look at trippy stuff on youtube and melt into pink floyd, you have a lot more energy
extra innings and hitting 9th for the home team during a low scoring game

the very first time i tripped on lsd, i walked around my campus and sat on a bench. then i watched what looked like ABSOLUTELY MASSIVE bees pollenate the flowers right next to me usually i just run away from bees but that time i watched them for what felt like 2 hours and started wondering what its like to be a bug and if they have a conciousness

it makes you delirious. not fun at all doesn #8217;t matter how you take it, but seriously don #8217;t take it you take around 400mg+ to really feel it but it #8217;s not comfortable and don #8217;t trip on dph

way free agency works in baseball is this 3 years of paid whatever the team wants to pay you 3 years where an arbitrator decides your salary free agency, where you can make as much money as you want players take little pay in their primes with the promise of big contracts when they #8217;re free agents. but now they #8217;re old and nobody wants to actually pay for them, but they already played their peak years severely discounted players want to be paid fairly if the markets moving towards team controlled players

smoking daily doesn #8217;t mean high 24/7.... I wake up, go to my lectures, get my shit done, then at like 10pm i relax and get high until i fall asleep I smoke every day, but i #8217;m definitely not addicted (didn #8217;t smoke yesterday or today and haven #8217;t even thought about it until now)

as a guitar player, some songs especially [pink floyd #8217;s insanely psychedelic early work](https://youtu.be/dfqEab9oCp0) all of a sudden made sense to me. Like the process of them writing the song, why they used the instruments and effects they did, etc. Music is a language and they are speaking through their guitars. Acid helped me translate it DXM is also really good for music, but i prefer lsd in every other aspect of the trip

it #8217;s more expensive and your tolerance will be really high. I also don #8217;t get the same quality of sleep as I do sober, and you can sometimes feel groggy/cloudy in the mornings. Not really a problem for me as I don #8217;t typically have obligations for a couple hours after I wake up you also get used to the feeling of being high, which makes the experience less fun than getting absolutely blasted to the moon once a month or so
if it #8217;s any consolation i #8217;m from a country with plenty of arranged marriages. My parents did not get one, and they hate each other sooooo much more than their arrange married friends

depends on the arranged marriage honestly. when its between two people who #8217;ve known each other for a significant part of their lives and already get along well, then yeah those marriages aren #8217;t so bad. Divorce isn #8217;t really a thing in India though, so i wouldn #8217;t really expect your friends to talk about it. Keep in mind, unfortunately our country used to burn widows to death just 100 years ago The green card marriage isn #8217;t as big of a deal either, it #8217;s not exactly hard to get into the states as an indian. in fact, just from my personal experience, it #8217;s way harder to visit india as an american citizen than coming to america with an indian citizenship
